title: Auction Template - Free eBay description generator
desc: Free and easy to use tool for your eBay listings. The best editor to load your ads, and to create and download responsive descriptions with custom themes.

hero.heading: eBay item descriptions with Auction Template
hero.subheading: Free to use. No Registration. Lightning fast.
hero.paragraph: Use Auction Template to generate your own custom eBay product description within seconds. Secure, free to use and without registration - forever.

1.title: Automated
1.description: Auction Template is connected to eBay and can load your listing directly - no need for double maintenance.

2.title: Free to use
2.description: Auction Template is an open source project and thus will always be available in a free version.

3.title: Secure
3.description: Auction Template is web-based and does not require a download or your eBay credentials.

4.title: Innovative editor
4.description: Auction Template can be easily operated without any previous knowledge configuring auction templates.

5.title: Modern design
5.description: Auction Template combines stylish auction templates with responsive optimization for mobile devices.

6.title: eBay compliant {{year}}
6.description: Auction Template is part of the eBay developers program and our templates are eBay policy compliant.

1.title: Load article
1.description: Find your item by the unique eBay item number or select it directly from your store. Auction Template takes care of the rest and loads all the information.

2.title: Optional: Edit content
2.description: Do you want to add, delete or edit content? No problem! If you want to change something regarding your product, you can of course do it in our editor.

3.title: Customize auction template
3.description: There are no limits to your creativity. Customize the expressive auction template according to your preferences and increase the recognition value of your eBay store.

4.title: Copy product description
4.description: Almost there! Now you need to copy this HTML code and add it to the product description of your eBay listing. We answer questions about this in our FAQ.

5.title: Relax
5.description: In the buying process of online shopping, meaningful product descriptions and appealing product images are elementary for a purchase decision. ยน
